overview: People often say female reporters are beautiful and smart, all in one. But, can a female reporter get what she really wants in the end? In this sex, lies and betrayal world, who can really get what they want? See what they will give up to get their way. See what needs to be sacrificed to get on top of this cruel world. You will be craving for sex with our steaming talents and scenes. They will get you crazy craving, craving for more-sex. You will lose control...
title: Dangerous
